name: Brighter Smiles Initiative
description:
With our mission to provide oral health supplies to underserved communities, Brighter Smiles Initiative aims to bridge disparities in oral healthcare across underserved communities in the Bay Area. Brighter Smiles Initiative (BSI) is a nonprofit organization founded by Rachael and Diba, two passionate pre-dental students from UC Berkeley. Committed to improving oral health equity, BSI aims to address disparities in dental care by providing essential oral health supplies to underserved communities. Our mission is to bring brighter, healthier smiles to those who need it most. Starting Spring 2025, BSI will also become an official club at UC Berkeley, broadening our impact and fostering a greater community of student volunteers dedicated to making a positive change.

We’re here to help bring brighter smiles and better oral health to everyone. Therefore, if you, or a community you know, need these supplies, please reach out to us. Also, you can support our philanthropic efforts by donating to us in order to support our care packages filled with toothbrushes, toothpaste, mouthwash, and floss that we deliver to communities in need. With your help, we can continue to enhance the quality of life for countless individuals through better oral health.

If you’re interested in learning more about our organization, check out our website at https://brightersmilesinitiative.com/. For updates and more information, you can also check out our Instagram page @brightersmilesinitiative. Together we can create healthier, “Brighter Smiles!”
summary: We are a philanthropic non-profit organization aimed at making a meaningful difference in the lives of underserved communities. Our mission is to provide access to oral health supplies to foster healthier and more confident smiles as pre-dental students.
